des: "I've had this recipe for years and keep on coming back to it. It vanishes fast at potlucks and parties, so other people seem to agree!"
ins: Stir mashed avocados, lemon juice, Worcestershire sauce, and hot pepper sauce in a bowl. Fold Cheddar cheese and tomatoes into avocado mixture.
